subject: College Athletics

Colleges and Universities
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: There is no limit to the number of financial aid packages given to any Ivy League team. But the task of matching aid packages within the league can be tricky.
snippet: There is no limit to the number of financial aid packages given to any Ivy League team. But the task of matching aid packages within the league can be tricky.
